resources.string:
Search with Keyword consisting of english letters or numbers. 

You can also search with: 

- Keyword1|Keyword2 format to search for books with both keywords in title. 

- Keyword1-Keyword2 format to search for books with Keyword1 in title and without Keyword2 in title.

The App is developed by Pratheek Shetty and Sidharth Kumar as a part of Android application lab mini project.The App consists of various features like adding books to favourites, summary about the book, sorting books based on ratings the profile of developers.
